Who: SCOURGE, Quickstride, Rat Trap
Location: Area around the Black Fortress

> Rat Trap is given the car door. He now tries to hold on with his legs, rather than hands.
>
> "Woahh, I dunno how this is gonna work big guy.. Guess we'll find out eventually."
>
> Quickstride faces the fortress, and stands his ground. The wind blows breezes through his mane as he looks onward, ears forward.
>
> "Remember Rat Trap, we don't make any moves unless they come after us first."

As Rat Trap and Quickstride prepare themselves Scourge merely moved to
float approximately 30 feet above them, somewhere between their
position and the fortress itself. He directed his scanners downward to
examine them, his own sense of curiosity aroused.

"As Hydras has not seen fit to have you destroyed utterly yet, I give
you time to try and run." Scourge chuckled to himself, "Stationary
prey is always of so little sport."

Scourge's cannons come online, disintegration beams and laser cutters,
designed to mow down prey and finish them off, however he as yet he
has not fired. Instead Scourge's engines were completely silent as he
hung there watching, like some lone aerial wolf or eagle, ready to
pounce on a rabbit.

(TAG)

Preston
